titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices or Ireland a proclamation. Charles Porter, Tho: Coningesby. Whereas several officers of the militia, and other inhabitants of the province of Munster, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook, assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queens most excellent Majesties on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at their Majesties castle of Dublin, this thirtieth day of April, 1691.".
Inhabitants of Munster to return to their homes.--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 201. Inha- Attendance dealt.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
